summary: Guido Carani, an engineer of noble descent, has just lost his son born to him by a chorus dancer, who, desperate, has become a nun. After a while he also loses his wife and daughter in a ... See full summary Â»
cast: Amedeo Nazzari|Yvonne Sanson|Enrica Dyrell|Alberto Farnese|Flora Lillo|Philippe Hersent|Nerio Bernardi|Virgilio Riento|Emilio Cigoli|Olga Solbelli|Ignazio Balsamo|Franca Parisi|Oscar Andriani|Rina Franchetti|Silvana Jachino|Giuseppe Chinnici|Amina Pirani Maggi|Paola Quattrini|Leonardo Bragaglia|Floria D'Alba|Enrico Olivieri
title: L'angelo bianco
